name: HH_MED_ORD_POC_STATUS
description: The status of whether the medication order is on the Plan of Care.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the plan of care flag was updated

columns.name: ON_PLAN_OF_CARE_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the medication order is on the Plan of Care as of the related instant.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
